the guy in the red jinbaori/vest is [Saigo] not Kondou...pretty sure
but I did watch the movie in fast forward

***the main character's sword style is Mugai Ryu (Okita I believe says
that the original/form is located in Edo however the hero clarified
and said that his sensei used derived forms---think back to the theme
of crosstraining and mix and match whatever technique you
like---unorthodox but whatever works is what important)

***(good scene) when someone tells Okita that "it" is on display at
(insert location)...and then emphasizes that "KONDO's HEAD" is on
display...the actor who portrays Okita, although not attractive did a
good job of conveying unspeakable anguish

***the movie does the whole black cat story too
